description: Scammer claims to be Microsoft support detecting virus on victim's computer. Attempts to get remote access via AnyDesk and payment for 'cleanup'.

turns.scammer_message: ALERT: Microsoft Security has detected CRITICAL VIRUS in your computer. Your banking passwords and personal files are at RISK! Contact Microsoft Certified Technician immediately.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god waht is happening?? sir pls help me i am very scared... my screen is showing red mark?? i have all my pension money in bank... pls tell me what to do beta... how do i contact you??

turns.scammer_message: Hello I am Rajesh from Microsoft Windows Support Team. We have detected hackers accessing your computer. I can help you remove the virus. Are you in front of your computer now?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: yes rajesh beta i am sitting in front of laptop only... but it is very slow and i am shaking... i cannot type properly... do you have phone number i can call? talking is better for me... pls help save my files

turns.scammer_message: Ok mam please download AnyDesk application from play store. It will allow me to see your screen and remove the virus. Your AnyDesk ID will show on screen, please share it with me.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok rajesh beta i am trying... i see red logo is that the one?? i clicked download but it is spinning round and round... my internet is very bad... beta while i wait pls tell me how much is the fee?? i want to pay you so you can fix this fast... do you take paytm or bank transfer??

turns.scammer_message: Mam dont worry AnyDesk is safe application used by all IT companies. Once I connect I will show you the hackers in your computer. Also call me on 8899776655 if you have any doubt.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i wrote down number 8899776655 on my diary... thank you... but this anydesk is taking too long... it says pending... beta pls tell me fee first... i get very nervous about money... do you use google pay?? what is your id?? i want to keep payment ready so you start work immediately when it connects...

turns.scammer_message: I have removed the basic virus but there is advanced malware also. For complete cleanup you need to purchase Microsoft Security Package Rs.4999. Pay to paytm@techsupport or GPay to 8899776655

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh thank god... ok beta i will pay 4999 rupees right now... i dont want any malware... i am opening my bhim app on phone... i typed paytm@techsupport... but it is asking to verify name?? i am scared to send to wrong person beta... what name should appear when i type this?? pls tell me exact name so i can click pay button safely...

turns.scammer_message: Mam this is one time lifetime protection. If payment issue then WhatsApp me on +91-7788996655. I will send you payment link also. Act fast before hackers come back!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am very scared of hackers coming back... i will pay 4999 immediately... i typed paytm@techsupport in my app... but before i press pay button pls tell me what name should appear?? i want to make sure it goes to you only... is it microsoft or your name?? pls confirm beta so i can send money now
